com.google.cloud.compute.deprecated

Class Disk

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.cloud.compute.deprecated.DiskInfo
      • com.google.cloud.compute.deprecated.Disk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Disk
extends DiskInfo
    A Google Compute Engine persistent disk. A disk can be used as primary storage for your virtual machine instances. Objects of this class are immutable. To get a Disk object with the most recent information use reload(com.google.cloud.compute.deprecated.Compute.DiskOption...). Disk adds a layer of service-related functionality over DiskInfo.
    See Also:
    Block Storage, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Checks if this disk exists.
        Returns:
        true if this disk exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ComputeException - upon failure

      • reload

        public Disk reload(Compute.DiskOption... options)
        Fetches current disk's latest information. Returns null if the disk does not exist.
        Parameters:
        options - disk options
        Returns:
        a Disk object with latest information or null if not found
        Throws:
        ComputeException - upon failure

      • delete

        public Operation delete(Compute.OperationOption... options)
        Deletes this disk.
        Returns:
        a zone operation if the delete request was successfully sent, null if the disk was not found
        Throws:
        ComputeException - upon failure

      • resize

        public Operation resize(long sizeGb,
                        Compute.OperationOption... options)
        Resizes this disk to the requested size. The new size must be larger than the previous one.
        Returns:
        a zone operation if the resize request was issued correctly, null if this disk was not found
        Throws:
        ComputeException - upon failure or if the new disk size is smaller than the previous one

        public Compute getCompute()
        Returns the disk's Compute object used to issue requests.
